LABEL: 0xFCF5
STRING: And those memories were again amplified through your dreams.

LABEL: 0xFD43
STRING: It wasn't as if there really was a crab with a human face, like Touri said――

LABEL: 0xFE10
STRING: 「I see.」

LABEL: 0xFE96
STRING: 「The crab Akari-chan saw was most likely a Heike crab.」

LABEL: 0xFEE9
STRING: 「Heike crab?」

LABEL: 0xFF0C
STRING: Tokiwa nodded her head as if answering her own question.

LABEL: 0xFF53
STRING: 「Heike crab. The pattern on its shell has been famous for looking like a human face since ancient times.」

LABEL: 0xFFAF
STRING: 「The anterior part of the gill area, the heart area, and the posterior margin of the carapace look like the eyes, the nose, and the mouth, respectively.」

LABEL: 0x10081
STRING: 「They're very cute.」

LABEL: 0x100A8
STRING: She said ecstatically.

LABEL: 0x100D4
STRING: However, I think Tokiwa was the only person on earth who would think that.

LABEL: 0x101FF
STRING: 「So you're saying the pattern looks like a face?」

LABEL: 0x10235
STRING: 「So it wasn't a real face after all.」

LABEL: 0x10267
STRING: 「It just looked that way by coincidence――」

LABEL: 0x1030C
STRING: 「"Coincidence."」

LABEL: 0x10326
STRING: 「"Coincidence" may be the wrong word for it.」

LABEL: 0x10368
STRING: 「There is a theory as to why a human face is imprinted on that shell.」

LABEL: 0x10405
STRING: Tokiwa twirled her upraised index finger and began to speak.

LABEL: 0x104C0
STRING: 「We all love crabs.」

LABEL: 0x104E6
STRING: 「They're delicious.」

LABEL: 0x10508
STRING: 「The fishermen fish lots of them.」

LABEL: 0x1059C
STRING: 「But crabs with human faces are creepy, so they let them go.」

LABEL: 0x10600
STRING: 「This was during a time when science was not so advanced as it is now.」

LABEL: 0x10640
STRING: 「Many people would've been scared of them, just like Akari-chan was when she was little.」

LABEL: 0x1068A
STRING: 「The "faceless crabs" continued to be fished for years and years...」

LABEL: 0x10740
STRING: 「And as a result, only the "crabs with faces" survived.」

LABEL: 0x107B4
STRING: Hiragino called out to Tokiwa, who had concluded her lecture.

LABEL: 0x10873
STRING: 「Artificial selection theory, right?」

LABEL: 0x10899
STRING: 「It's an example of evolutionary adaptation to the environment where you're being harvested by people.」

LABEL: 0x10958
STRING: 「Evolution?」

LABEL: 0x10970
STRING: 「What's so special about a shell that looks like a person's face?」

LABEL: 0x10A33
STRING: 「Ah, well...」

LABEL: 0x10AC1
STRING: 「Evolution is a much broader concept, not limited to the level of apes becoming humans, or anything like that.」

LABEL: 0x10B27
STRING: 「Evolution is based on the three principles of natural selection... Well, in simple terms, it means that mutations are inherited.」

LABEL: 0x10B8D
STRING: 「It's not a thing that happens in one generation but an inherited mutation that affects the efficiency of survival and reproduction...」

LABEL: Split9
STRING: 「Sorry, that was a bit difficult, wasn't it?」

LABEL: 0x10C90
STRING: 「Ahaha...」

LABEL: 0x10CB3
STRING: Touri glossed it over with a laugh.

LABEL: 0x10D50
STRING: 「But, that's good then.」

LABEL: 0x10D6E
STRING: 「That means I was wrong, and it wasn't the work of evil spirits.」

LABEL: 0x10E39
STRING: 「Yes. That's one theory, but it can be explained without bringing up the ghost of Heike.」

LABEL: 0x10EAE
STRING: Tokiwa, who had been speaking eloquently so far, instantly returned to her drowsy, half-closed eyes.

LABEL: 0x10F77
STRING: 「...Anyway, submarines are a lot more boring than I thought they'd be.」

LABEL: 0x1103A
STRING: 「You think so?」

LABEL: 0x110C2
STRING: 「I'm having a lot of fun.」

LABEL: 0x110EB
STRING: Touri tilted her head.

LABEL: 0x11109
STRING: It was odd that some people could truly have fun on a sunken ship.

LABEL: 0x111D1
STRING: 「Hmmmm...」

LABEL: 0x111E9
STRING: 「I'm bored.」

LABEL: 0x11203
STRING: 「Let's do something.」

LABEL: 0x11293
STRING: 「Let's play a second round, okay?」

LABEL: 0x1131E
STRING: Afterward.

LABEL: 0x11338
STRING: Midway through, Hiragino went to check on Reiri,

LABEL: 0x1136C
STRING: and Yukari went to put away the drinks.

LABEL: 0x11396
STRING: We ended up spending a lot of time in the playroom, although the participants changed several times.

LABEL: 0x113F4
STRING: And so――

LABEL: 0x1140E
STRING: I wasn't Touri, but even I thought it was enjoyable for a moment.

LABEL: 0x11452
STRING: If only this could last forever, I thought it wouldn't be so bad.

LABEL: 0x114F8
STRING: However.

LABEL: 0x1150E
STRING: I knew it was just escapism.

LABEL: 0x1154A
STRING: We were trying to distract ourselves from reality with chess.

LABEL: 0x1157A
STRING: We were trying to distract ourselves by laughing.

LABEL: 0x115B0
STRING: I was only averting my eyes from the guilt looming over me...

LABEL: 0x115EA
STRING: I had no right to do that――

LABEL: 0x116DB
STRING: 「Can I go check on Reiri for a minute?」

LABEL: 0x1173D
STRING: When Touri left, silence suddenly fell inside the room.

LABEL: 0x11771
STRING: We didn't force ourselves to maintain our brief conversations and laughter.

LABEL: 0x117AF
STRING: I was savoring this moment of rest.

LABEL: 0x117EB
STRING: But then, I heard something strange outside the window.

LABEL: 0x1181F
STRING: A long, low-pitched sound... Was that the submarine making that noise?

LABEL: 0x11859
STRING: 「What's that sound?」

LABEL: 0x118FE
STRING: 「Oh, that's probably a dolphin or a whale.」

LABEL: 0x11931
STRING: Tokiwa said without hesitation.

LABEL: 0x11959
STRING: So this was what their cries sounded like...

LABEL: 0x1198D
STRING: I was surprised that they were in this depth in the first place.

LABEL: 0x11A56
STRING: 「Yes, bottleneck dolphins can dive over 500 meters deep.」

LABEL: 0x11A86
STRING: 「And sperm whales have been recorded to dive as deep as 3000 meters.」

LABEL: 0x11AEC
STRING: Tokiwa's knowledge of marine life was outstanding.

LABEL: 0x11B30
STRING: She more than made up for what she might lack in general knowledge in topics like this.

LABEL: 0x11BB9
STRING: I thought back to the time I had gone to a dolphin show after hearing about one.

LABEL: 0x11C0D
STRING: As I went through my memories of Aquamarine Park, I recalled that the mascot costume had left a stronger impression on me than the show itself.

LABEL: 0x11C7D
STRING: But, the whole experience was exciting enough for me as a high school student.

LABEL: 0x11CC1
STRING: 「When I watch dolphin shows, I realize how intelligent dolphins really are.」

LABEL: 0x11D94
STRING: 「It's just operant conditioning. Even humans can do that if you train them.」

LABEL: 0x11DF1
STRING: Tokiwa waved her hand.

LABEL: 0x11E94
STRING: 「On the other hand, it's true that dolphins are said to be one of the few animals that communicate with their voices.」

LABEL: 0x11EF4
STRING: 「When they find food, for example, they will mimic the voice of the other to communicate with a particular mate.」

LABEL: 0x11FBA
STRING: 「But... Recently, an individual was discovered that mimicked the voice of its dead mate.」

LABEL: 0x12041
STRING: A dead mate――

LABEL: 0x1205F
STRING: With those words, the atmosphere became instantly tense.

LABEL: 0x1209F
STRING: 「A dead mate... Why is that?」

LABEL: 0x1214C
STRING: 「Who knows? I'd like to ask the dolphin.」

LABEL: 0x1218E
STRING: 「What we do know is that the more central role an individual has in the pod, the more frequently they are mimicked after death.」

LABEL: 0x12200
STRING: 「In other words, the cries we hear now may be the voices of the dead, calling from the past.」

LABEL: 0x1228E
STRING: The sound of dolphins.

LABEL: 0x122A8
STRING: The voice of the dead.

LABEL: 0x122C0
STRING: The observation deck flashed through my mind.

LABEL: 0x122EA
STRING: I recalled the bodies of the dead.

LABEL: 0x1231D
STRING: 「The sea, unlike space, is full of life.」

LABEL: 0x12353
STRING: 「That is to say, life exists here.」

LABEL: 0x12381
STRING: 「However, tens of thousands, billions, trillions of times more death is falling down on us.」

LABEL: 0x12814
STRING: 「The sea is full of death.」

LABEL: 0x128AA
STRING: 「Stooopp!!」

LABEL: 0x128F1
STRING: I couldn't take it anymore. I screamed, and everyone in the room turned to look at me.

LABEL: 0x12935
STRING: What I saw in their eyes was surprise and fear.

LABEL: 0x12965
STRING: Stop...

LABEL: 0x1297D
STRING: Don't look at me like that...

LABEL: 0x12AA9
STRING: 「Are you alright? Calm down.」

LABEL: 0x12AD4
STRING: 「I did it...」

LABEL: 0x12AFA
STRING: 「It was me!」

LABEL: 0x12B14
STRING: Hiragino's hand stretched toward me.

LABEL: 0x12B5F
STRING: I brushed it off roughly.

LABEL: 0x12B87
STRING: 「I just wanted to know...」

LABEL: 0x12BB7
STRING: 「I wanted to know what happened in this sea seven years ago!」

LABEL: 0x12BE9
STRING: 「It wasn't supposed to be like this...」

LABEL: 0x12C11
STRING: 「It wasn't supposed to turn out like this!!」

LABEL: 0x12C41
STRING: 「Because of me, everyone...」

LABEL: 0x12C63
STRING: 「Why...? Why――!」

LABEL: 0x12D04
STRING: 「I knew it, you――」

LABEL: 0x12D3B
STRING: 「――Drop it.」

LABEL: 0x12D83
STRING: Hiragino interrupted Yukari, who tried to press me further.

LABEL: 0x12E2C
STRING: 「What do you mean...?」

LABEL: 0x12E50
STRING: 「Seven years ago was-no.」

LABEL: 0x12EE6
STRING: 「What is it that you know?」

LABEL: 0x12F15
STRING: 「I'm the one who changed the course of this submarine!」

LABEL: 0x12F49
STRING: 「We can't contact the surface?」

LABEL: 0x12F71
STRING: 「Of course we can't!」

LABEL: 0x12FF7
STRING: 「I'm the one who cut us off!」

LABEL: 0x1301F
STRING: I covered my face with my hands and shouted out.

LABEL: 0x13059
STRING: I twisted my body to shake off Hiragino's hand on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x13155
STRING: 「Calm down, лл-kun.」

LABEL: 0x13177
STRING: 「Do you understand what you're saying here?」

LABEL: 0x131E3
STRING: 「My sister died in this sea!」

LABEL: 0x1320D
STRING: 「In this place!」

LABEL: 0x1322B
STRING: 「And yet――」

LABEL: 0x1324B
STRING: 「And yet――!」

LABEL: 0x13269
STRING: 「Why is there "nothing" here?!」

LABEL: 0x1328F
STRING: 「Why did we crash into the sea floor?!」

LABEL: 0x132C3
STRING: 「The simulations were perfect!」

LABEL: 0x132F3
STRING: 「This isn't possible!」

LABEL: 0x13315
STRING: 「This accident―it wasn't supposed to happen!」

LABEL: 0x1334D
STRING: 「But... But... It happened!」

LABEL: 0x1337F
STRING: 「I killed them, all of them!」

LABEL: 0x134BD
STRING: 「Calm down!」

LABEL: 0x134DE
STRING: I was caught by Hiragino's hands again, and I crumbled to my knees.

LABEL: 0x1354B
STRING: My knees hurt, but that didn't matter.

LABEL: 0x1357F
STRING: My whole body went weak, and my vision wavered...

LABEL: 0x135A9
STRING: There was only guilt swirling around me.

LABEL: 0x13638
STRING: It controlled me.

LABEL: 0x13656
STRING: I couldn't think of anything.

LABEL: 0x13676
STRING: I didn't want to think.

LABEL: 0x136A8
STRING: 「――Katagiri-san.」

LABEL: 0x136C6
STRING: 「You mentioned seven years ago...」

LABEL: 0x136E6
STRING: 「Are you her――」

LABEL: 0x1372D
STRING: 「――Who are you?」

LABEL: 0x1377A
STRING: 「My name is――」

LABEL: 0x13874
STRING: 「Kyaaaaaaa――!!」

LABEL: 0x13940
STRING: Suddenly, we heard Touri's scream.

LABEL: 0x13966
STRING: And the sound of overlapping sirens.

LABEL: 0x1398E
STRING: The playroom turned chaotic.

LABEL: 0x13A2D
STRING: 「Momoi, what was that?」

LABEL: 0x13AC8
STRING: 「The fire alarm.」

LABEL: 0x13AE6
STRING: 「――It might be nothing, but...」

LABEL: 0x13B8A
STRING: 「Let's go.」

STRING: Yukari ran out.

STRING: Tokiwa followed behind.

STRING: I was left alone in the playroom――

STRING: 「You're coming too!」

STRING: I tried to shake it off.

LABEL: 0x13E16
STRING: 「I'll hear it later. Now come!」

LABEL: 0x13EAB

STRING: 「Watch out for the steps!」

STRING: 「There!」
